subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Diana D’Alessio of the United States and Jin-joo Hong of South Korea shared a three-stroke lead yesterday after the second round of the Evian Masters in France.Michelle Wie rebounded with a one-under-par 71 for a 144 total and made the cut. She had gone 24 consecutive rounds without breaking par.D’Alessio, who shot a 68, and Hong, who finished with a 70, were at seven-under 137. Annika Sorenstam (69) was a shot back. Juli Inkster, had five birdies in the first seven holes for a 68 to join a large group at 141.
